text: George Richard Chamberlain (March 31, 1934 – March 29, 2025) was an American movie, television, voice, stage actor, and singer. He was known for his role as Dr. Kildare in the TV series of the same name. He has won two Golden Globe Awards. Chamberlain was born on March 31, 1934 in Beverly Hills, California.Richard Chamberlain Biography (1934–) He studied at Beverly Hills High School and at Pomona College. He was partners with Martin Rabbett from the 1970s through 2010. Chamberlain died of problems caused from a stroke in Waimānalo, Hawaii on March 29, 2025, two days before his 91st birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Richard Chamberlain complete and regularly updated Webbiography Category:1934 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Actors from Beverly Hills, California Category:LGBT people from California Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:LGBT actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Singers from Los Angeles County, California Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Richard Chamberlain
